amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 116-6 to require annual reports on participation in this program and biannual reports on any other child care related barriers that remain for veterans seeking care at VA medical facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Moore.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
